archimate:ApplicationService.name: Key Recovery
archimate:ApplicationService.documentation: The process of recovering access to and control of a set of Private Keysâ€”or an entire Walletâ€”after loss or compromise. Key Recovery is a major focus of the emerging DKMS standard for cryptographic key management. See also Recovery Key.
